ValidationRule.description: If Unregistered Channel Partner is checked then user cannot edit the record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", Channel_Partner_From_CP_Portal__c = false, NOT(ISNEW()), Unregistered_Channel_Partner__c = true, $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_booking == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You Cannot edit record because Unregistered Channel Partner is checked.
